title: Where’s the fastest 5G in the US? Opensignal report breaks down 5G speeds
content:
Opensignal is out today with its latest in-depth report on 5G. The new data not only answers the question “where’s the fastest 5G in the US?” but also shows how much each state has improved, what availability is like, and more.

more…

The post Where’s the fastest 5G in the US? Opensignal report breaks down 5G speeds appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: A new in-depth report from Opensignal answers the question: where's the fastest 5G in the US? Plus best availability and more.
